TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Instrumentation extends System.Object

Docs.summary:
Provides helper functions for exposing events and data for management. There is a single instance of this class per application domain.
Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The default constructor initializes any fields to their default values.
## .NET Framework Security Full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool IsAssemblyRegistered(class System.Reflection.Assembly assemblyToRegister) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> containing instrumentation instance or event types.
Docs.summary: Determines if the instrumentation schema of the specified assembly has already been correctly registered with WMI.
Docs.returns: if the instrumentation schema in the specified assembly is registered with WMI; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void RegisterAssembly(class System.Reflection.Assembly assemblyToRegister) cil managed

Docs.param: The <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> containing instrumentation instance or event types.
Docs.summary: Registers the management instance or event classes in the specified assembly with WMI. This ensures that the instrumentation schema is accessible to client applications.

remarks.format:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Revoke(object instanceData) cil managed

Docs.param: The object to remove from visibility for management instrumentation.
Docs.summary: Makes an instance that was previously published through the <xref:System.Management.Instrumentation.Instrumentation.Publish%2A> method no longer visible through management instrumentation.
